    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SpenSettingSelectionLayout(Context context, String customImagePath, RelativeLayout relativeLayout)
      Selection Setting Layout does not support (RTL) Right To Left mirroring, therefore, please set layout direction View.LAYOUT_DIRECTION_LTR for its parent view so that SDK can have normal display and operation.
      SpenSettingSelectionLayout(Context context, String customImagePath, RelativeLayout relativeLayout, float ratio)
      Selection Setting Layout does not support (RTL) Right To Left mirroring, therefore, please set layout direction View.LAYOUT_DIRECTION_LTR for its parent view so that SDK can have normal display and operation.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SpenSettingSelectionLayout

        public SpenSettingSelectionLayout(Context context,
                          String customImagePath,
                          RelativeLayout relativeLayout)
        Selection Setting Layout does not support (RTL) Right To Left mirroring, therefore, please set layout direction View.LAYOUT_DIRECTION_LTR for its parent view so that SDK can have normal display and operation.
        Creates an SpenSelectionSettingLayout instance with the specified image path and relative layout. The following parameters must be not null.
        Parameters:
        context - [in] The Context for application.
        customImagePath - [in] The path of the image to be used internally (String)
        relativeLayout - [in] The upper of the Layout
        Since:
        3.0.0

      • SpenSettingSelectionLayout

        public SpenSettingSelectionLayout(Context context,
                          String customImagePath,
                          RelativeLayout relativeLayout,
                          float ratio)
        Selection Setting Layout does not support (RTL) Right To Left mirroring, therefore, please set layout direction View.LAYOUT_DIRECTION_LTR for its parent view so that SDK can have normal display and operation.
        Creates an SpenSelectionSettingLayout instance with the specified image path, relative layout, and ratio. The following parameters must be not null.
        Parameters:
        context - [in] The Context for application.
        customImagePath - [in] The path of the image to be used internally (String)
        relativeLayout - [in] The upper of the Layout
        ratio - [in] The overall size adjusting ratio (This ratio must be greater than 0). If ratio is larger than 2.0f, it will be set to 2.0f.
        Throws:
        OutOfMemoryError - If ratio is too large, bitmap size exceeds VM budget. Therefore, please consider your ratio carefully, bitmaps can quickly consume your available memory budget leading to an application crash due to the dreaded exception.
        Since:
        3.0.0

      • setIndicatorPosition

        public void setIndicatorPosition(int position)
        Set the specified position for the popup indicator.
        Parameters:
        position - The X coordinate of the popup indicator in pixels. If X is less than 0, indicator will be inVisible. If X is greater than setting layout's width, indicator will show on the right side of setting layout.
        Since:
        3.0.0
